features: Odour Elimination: Shoe Fresh combines colloidal silver and essential oils to target bacteria and fungi, keeping your shoes fresh and odour-free.
Natural Antibacterial Formula: Colloidal silver and tea tree oil provide antibacterial protection, targeting the root cause of shoe odours.
Naturally Refreshing: The calming scent of lavender and the energizing aroma of peppermint create a perfectly balanced fragrance.
All-Natural: Made with natural ingredients, Shoe Fresh is free from harsh chemicals and safe for daily use.
description: Product Description Stay Fresh, Naturally – The Ultimate Antibacterial Deodoriser for Shoes and Sports Gear Active Ingredients Previous page The Power of Colloidal Silver Harness the natural antibacterial power of colloidal silver to neutralise odour-causing bacteria. Safe, effective, and chemical-free, keep your shoes fresh and hygienic the natural way. Lavender Essentail Oil Lavender essential oil soothes with its calming aroma while naturally fighting odours. Its antimicrobial properties help keep your shoes fresh and fragrant, creating a relaxing scent that lasts. Tea Tree Essential Oil Tea tree essential oil offers powerful antibacterial and antifungal benefits, making it ideal for eliminating odour-causing bacteria. It leaves your shoes clean, fresh, and hygienic with every use. Peppermint Essential Oil Peppermint essential oil invigorates with a crisp, refreshing scent while providing natural antibacterial protection. It combats odours and leaves your shoes feeling cool and revitalised. Next page Versatile and Multi-Purpose Not just for shoes! This versatile spray is perfect for all your sports gear. From gloves and pads to bags and mats, our deodoriser works effectively across a range of items, ensuring they stay fresh and odour-free, no matter how hard you train. 100% Natural & Chemical-Free We believe in the power of nature. That’s why our deodoriser is made from 100% natural ingredients, free from harsh chemicals and synthetic fragrances. Safe for all materials, our formula is gentle yet powerful, providing long-lasting freshness without compromising your health or the environment. How to Use Using our deodoriser is quick and easy. Simply shake, spray, and let the natural ingredients work their magic. Use it daily or as needed to maintain freshness in your shoes and sports equipment. ISO Certified Benatural Essentials is committed to quality and safety. All of our products are manufactured in accordance with ISO 22716:2007 Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) for cosmetics. This international standard ensures that our processes meet rigorous guidelines for quality control, safety, and hygiene throughout production. Scientifically Tested Our Colloidal Silver has been scientifically tested and shown to have negative effects on harmful bacteria. These results support its potential as an effective option for reducing bacterial presence in various applications.
